title: Business Mathematics Project-Based Instruction Utilizing Anchored Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary arithmetic operations, statistical concepts, and comprehension of simple financial statements
context.additional_context: Context-Based Problem-Solving Environment Utilizing Digital Devices with Real Business Scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically design sales forecasting models by analyzing real-world business cases
Learners can perform break-even analysis and decision-making simulations using financial statement data
Learners propose systematic processes for solving complex business problems through project-based collaboration
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
